pl.bristleback.server.bristle.serialization.system.annotation

Annotation Type Bind


  • @Target(value={PARAMETER,FIELD})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Bind
    This annotation can be placed before each action parameter to provide validation. Currently only format, required and skipped flags are supported. Other validations will be provided in next versions.

    Created on: 2011-07-26 12:34:56

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean detailedErrors
      Indicates whether exceptions should return detailed information about which fields contains errors.
      String format
      Specifies format in which annotated objects will be serialized/deserialized.
      Property[] properties 
      boolean required
      This property should be used when field is of simple type.

    • Element Detail

      • properties

        public abstract Property[] properties
        Default:
        {}

      • required

        public abstract boolean required
        This property should be used when field is of simple type.
        Returns:
        true if this simple action parameter is required, false otherwise.
        Default:
        false

      • detailedErrors

        public abstract boolean detailedErrors
        Indicates whether exceptions should return detailed information about which fields contains errors. This flag is temporary disabled.
        Returns:
        true if detailed error messages should be sent for bound object.
        Default:
        false

      • format

        public abstract String format
        Specifies format in which annotated objects will be serialized/deserialized. Note that there must be FormattingValueSerializer bean registered for the type that wants to be serialized/deserialized using specified format.
        Returns:
        format format in which objects of the specified type will be serialized/deserialized.
        Default:
        ""
